name: Widows Peak
description: The most precarious campground. Located 200 feet above Mt. Kahnuna in Nebraska. This is the most brave of campers.

name: Serpent Lake
description: This campground is located in East China. It is known for its deep green rivers and beautiful wildlife.

name: Blue Ridges
description: Located up 20,000 feet this is harsh terrain is for only the most seasoned campers.

name: Wild Alaska
description: Located in beautiful Alaska. This campground has the best of America.
